CREATE TABLE lotto (
    id INT(11) PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
    date DATETIME NOT NULL,
    regNumbers VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    n1 VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL,
    n2 VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL,
    n3 VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL,
    n4 VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL,
    n5 VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL,
    n6 VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL,
    dblNumbers VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    dbln1 VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL,
    dbln2 VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL,
    dbln3 VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL,
    dbln4 VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL,
    dbln5 VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL,
    dbln6 VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL
);
